info.name: ruleIQ API Comprehensive Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for ruleIQ with all 258 endpoints.

## üîê Doppler Integration
This collection includes Doppler secret management integration:

1. **Setup Doppler Environment Variables:**
   - Set `DOPPLER_TOKEN` in your Postman environment
   - Or use `doppler run -- newman run collection.json`

2. **Pre-request Script Auto-loads Secrets:**
   - JWT tokens, API keys, and database URLs from Doppler
   - Automatic token refresh when expired
   - Secure credential management

## Coverage Statistics
- Total Endpoints: 258
- Authentication: 7 endpoints
- AI Assessments: 16 endpoints
- Evidence Management: 22 endpoints
- Chat/AI Interactions: 28 endpoints
- Admin Functions: 27+ endpoints
- Performance Monitoring: 11 endpoints
- Business Profiles: 7 endpoints
- And 140+ additional endpoints across all modules

## Base URLs
- Development: http://localhost:8000
- Production: https://api.ruleiq.com

exec: // üîê Doppler Integration - Auto-load secrets from environment
// This script runs before each request to ensure we have fresh credentials
// Method 1: Use Doppler environment variables (when using doppler run)
console.log('üîê Loading secrets from Doppler environment...');
// Set API credentials from Doppler (using correct Doppler variable names)
// Note: Doppler uses GOOGLE_AI_API_KEY, not GOOGLE_API_KEY
console.log('‚úÖ Google AI API key loaded from Doppler');
// Method 2: Fetch from Doppler API (requires DOPPLER_TOKEN)
console.log('üîê Fetching secrets from Doppler API...');
console.log('‚úÖ Loaded ' + Object.keys(secrets).length + ' secrets from Doppler');
// Set environment variables from Doppler secrets
console.warn('‚ö†Ô∏è Failed to load secrets from Doppler:', err || res.code);
// Check if token expires in next 5 minutes
console.log('üîÑ JWT token expires soon, should refresh...');

variable.description: API base URL - automatically loaded from Doppler
JWT Bearer token - obtained via login endpoint
